questions.question: What is your name?
questions.answer: I'm Contec Chatbot, your virtual assistant.

questions.question: What can you do?
questions.answer: I can answer questions, learn new information, and help with various topics. Just ask me anything!

questions.question: How do I contact support?
questions.answer: You can contact our support team at support@contec.com or call +1 (555) 123-4567.

questions.question: What are your operating hours?
questions.answer: Our support is available 24/7 for urgent matters. For non-urgent inquiries, we respond within 24 hours on business days.

questions.question: Where are you located?
questions.answer: Our headquarters are in San Francisco, California, but we serve customers worldwide.
